C nhng c hi vic lm no?

Xin li, nhng ti khng tm thy thng tin v cc c hi vic lm trong h thng. Nu bn ang tm kim c hi vic lm, ti khuyn bn nn lin h vi b phn nhn s hoc phng vic lm ca trng  bit thm thng tin.

Tuy nhin, ti c th cung cp mt s gi  chung v cc ngun thng tin vic lm m bn c th tham kho:

1. Trang web vic lm ca trng: Nhiu trng i hc c trang web ring  ng ti thng tin v cc c hi vic lm cho sinh vin.
2. Mng x hi: Cc trang mng x hi nh LinkedIn, Facebook, v Twitter thng c cc nhm v trang dnh cho vic tm kim vic lm.
3. Cc cng ty tuyn dng: Bn c th tm kim cc cng ty tuyn dng trong lnh vc bn quan tm v xem xt cc c hi vic lm ca h.
4. Cc s kin vic lm: Tham gia cc s kin vic lm v hi ch vic lm  gp g cc nh tuyn dng v tm hiu v cc c hi vic lm.

Hy vng nhng gi  ny s gip bn tm c c hi vic lm ph hp!

title: C nhng c hi vic lm no?

messages.content: C nhng c hi vic lm no?

Xin cho! Ti rt tic khi thng tin trong h thng ca ti khng cung cp thng tin c th v cc c hi vic lm hin ti. Tuy nhin, ti c th  xut mt s cch  bn tm kim cc c hi vic lm ph hp:

1. **Truy cp trang web ca trng**: Bn c th kim tra trang web chnh thc ca trng  tm kim cc thng bo v vic lm, thc tp, hoc cc chng trnh lin kt vi cc cng ty.
2. **Lin h vi B phn Vic lm ca trng**: B phn ny thng cung cp thng tin v cc c hi vic lm, t chc cc s kin tuyn dng, v h tr sinh vin trong qu trnh tm kim vic lm.
3. **Tm kim trn cc trang web vic lm trc tuyn**: C nhiu trang web vic lm trc tuyn nh LinkedIn, Indeed, hoc Glassdoor, ni bn c th tm kim cc cng vic theo lnh vc, v tr, hoc tn cng ty.
4. **Tham gia cc s kin tuyn dng**: Tham gia cc s kin tuyn dng, hi ch vic lm, hoc cc bui gp g vi cc cng ty  tm hiu v cc c hi vic lm v mng li vi cc nh tuyn dng.

Nu bn c thng tin c th v lnh vc hoc loi cng vic bn quan tm, ti c th c gng gip bn tm kim thng tin lin quan. Hy cho ti bit nu bn cn thm h tr!
C nhng c hi vic lm no?

Xin cho! Ti rt tic khi thng tin trong h thng ca ti khng cung cp thng tin c th v cc c hi vic lm hin ti. Tuy nhin, ti c th  xut mt s cch  bn tm kim cc c hi vic lm ph hp:

1. **Truy cp trang web ca trng**: Bn c th kim tra trang web chnh thc ca trng  tm kim cc thng bo v vic lm, thc tp, hoc cc chng trnh lin kt vi cc cng ty.
2. **Lin h vi B phn Vic lm ca trng**: B phn ny thng cung cp thng tin v cc c hi vic lm, t chc cc s kin tuyn dng, v h tr sinh vin trong qu trnh tm kim vic lm.
3. **Tm kim trn cc trang web vic lm trc tuyn**: C nhiu trang web vic lm trc tuyn nh LinkedIn, Indeed, hoc Glassdoor, ni bn c th tm kim cc cng vic theo lnh vc, v tr, hoc tn cng ty.
4. **Tham gia cc s kin tuyn dng**: Tham gia cc s kin tuyn dng, hi ch vic lm, hoc cc bui gp g vi cc cng ty  tm hiu v cc c hi vic lm v mng li vi cc nh tuyn dng.

Nu bn c thng tin c th v lnh vc hoc loi cng vic bn quan tm, ti c th c gng gip bn tm kim thng tin lin quan. Hy cho ti bit nu bn cn thm h tr!

Nu bn mun bit thm thng tin v cc c hi vic lm, bn c th lin h vi B phn Vic lm ca trng hoc truy cp trang web ca trng  tm kim thng tin cp nht.

title: What scholarships are available for students?

messages.content: What scholarships are available for students?

There are several scholarships available for students at VGU. Here are the details:

[1] **IT Scholarship for Students in Need - Round 3**: This scholarship is provided by the VGU Development Fund and offers 15,000,000 VND. The application deadline is **March 5, 2026**. Requirements include a GPA of 3.5 or higher, no disciplinary violations, and active participation in school activities.

[2] **IT Department Excellence Scholarship**: Provided by the VGU Foundation, this scholarship offers 21,000,000 VND. The application deadline is **February 11, 2026**. Requirements include a GPA of 3.1 or higher, no disciplinary violations, and active participation in school activities.

[3] **Cybersecurity Scholarship - Round 13**: Offered by the German Business Association in Vietnam, this scholarship provides 15,000,000 VND. The application deadline is **March 3, 2026**. Requirements include a GPA of 2.7 or higher, no disciplinary violations, and active participation in school activities.

[4] **Cloud Computing Scholarship - Round 12**: Provided by the Ministry of Education and Training, this scholarship offers 16,000,000 VND. The application deadline is **February 9, 2026**. Requirements include a GPA of 3.7 or higher, no disciplinary violations, and active participation in school activities.

[5] **Information Security Scholarship - Round 6**: Offered by DAAD (German Academic Exchange Service), this scholarship provides 15,000,000 VND. The application deadline is **March 4, 2026**. Requirements include a GPA of 3.3 or higher, no disciplinary violations, and active participation in school activities.

[6] **Web Development Scholarship - Round 9**: Provided by the Ministry of Education and Training, this scholarship offers 5,000,000 VND. The application deadline is **April 14, 2026**. Requirements include a GPA of 2.9 or higher, no disciplinary violations, and active participation in school activities.

[7] **Software Development Scholarship - Round 5**: Offered by the VGU Development Fund, this scholarship provides 13,000,000 VND. The application deadline is **January 15, 2026** (please note that this deadline has already passed).

[8] **Game Development Scholarship - Round 8**: Provided by Siemens Corporation, this scholarship offers 5,000,000 VND. The application deadline is **April 9, 2026**. Requirements include a GPA of 3.9 or higher, no disciplinary violations, and active participation in school activities.

[9] **Programming Talent Scholarship - Round 7**: Offered by the VGU Development Fund, this scholarship provides 14,000,000 VND. The application deadline is **January 29, 2026** (please note that this deadline has already passed).

[10] **Data Science Scholarship - Round 11**: Provided by Bosch Corporation, this scholarship offers 10,000,000 VND. The application deadline is **May 12, 2026**. Requirements include a GPA of 3.5 or higher, no disciplinary violations, and active participation in school activities.

Please note that some deadlines have already passed, and it's essential to check the eligibility criteria and application process for each scholarship. You can submit your application through the VGU online system, including an application form, transcript, and recommendation letter. Don't miss the application deadlines to ensure you don't miss out on these opportunities!

title: tm cc hc bng trong k ti

messages.content: tm cc hc bng trong k ti

Xin cho! Ti rt vui c gip bn tm kim cc hc bng trong k ti. Tuy nhin, ti khng tm thy thng tin c th v cc hc bng trong h thng RAG Context.

Nhng ti c th cung cp mt s gi  chung v cch tm kim hc bng:

1. **Truy cp trang web ca trng**: Bn c th truy cp trang web ca trng  tm kim thng tin v cc hc bng hin c.
2. **Lin h vi b phn hc bng**: Bn c th lin h vi b phn hc bng ca trng  hi v cc hc bng hin c v cc yu cu cn thit .
3. **Tm kim trn internet**: Bn c th tm kim trn internet v cc hc bng hin c v cc yu cu cn thit .

Mt s hc bng ph bin m bn c th tm kim:

* Hc bng chnh ph
* Hc bng ca cc t chc phi li nhun
* Hc bng ca cc doanh nghip
* Hc bng du hc

Nu bn mun tm kim hc bng c th, vui lng cung cp cho ti thm thng tin v loi hc bng bn mun tm kim, chng hn nh:
* Ngnh hc
* Trnh  hc vn
* Quc gia hoc khu vc bn mun hc
* Thi gian hc

Ti s c gng gip bn tm kim cc hc bng ph hp vi nhu cu ca bn.

2. **Hc bng Cybersecurity Scholarship - Round 13**: Hc bng ny c cung cp bi German Business Association in Vietnam, vi gi tr 15.000.000 VND. Thi hn np n l **3/3/2026**. Yu cu: GPA 2.7 hoc cao hn, khng vi phm k lut, tham gia hot ng trng hc tch cc.
3. **Hc bng Game Development Scholarship - Round 8**: Hc bng ny c cung cp bi Siemens Corporation, vi gi tr 5.000.000 VND. Thi hn np n l **4/9/2026**. Yu cu: GPA 3.9 hoc cao hn, khng vi phm k lut, tham gia hot ng trng hc tch cc.
4. **Hc bng Web Development Scholarship - Round 9**: Hc bng ny c cung cp bi Ministry of Education and Training, vi gi tr 5.000.000 VND. Thi hn np n l **4/14/2026**. Yu cu: GPA 2.9 hoc cao hn, khng vi phm k lut, tham gia hot ng trng hc tch cc.
5. **Hc bng IT Scholarship for Students in Need - Round 3**: Hc bng ny c cung cp bi VGU Development Fund, vi gi tr 15.000.000 VND. Thi hn np n l **3/5/2026**. Yu cu: GPA 3.5 hoc cao hn, khng vi phm k lut, tham gia hot ng trng hc tch cc.

Ti xin li v trc  khng c thng tin v hc bng ti VGU. Tuy nhin, ti c th cung cp mt s thng tin chung v cc chng trnh hc bng ti VGU nh sau:

Xin lu  rng khng c thng tin c th v hc bng ti VGU trong h thng RAG Context. Tuy nhin, bn c th tham kho cc thng tin sau:

* VGU thng cung cp cc chng trnh hc bng cho sinh vin xut sc, sinh vin c hon cnh kh khn, hoc sinh vin tham gia hot ng trng hc tch cc.
* Cc chng trnh hc bng c th bao gm hc bng ton phn, hc bng bn phn, hoc hc bng h tr ti chnh.
*  bit thm thng tin v cc chng trnh hc bng ti VGU, bn c th lin h vi b phn hc bng ca trng hoc truy cp trang web ca trng.

Nu bn mun bit thm thng tin v cc chng trnh hc bng ti VGU, ti c th  xut mt s cch  bn tm kim thng tin:

* Truy cp trang web ca VGU  tm kim thng tin v cc chng trnh hc bng.
* Lin h vi b phn hc bng ca VGU  hi v cc chng trnh hc bng hin c.
* Tm kim trn internet v cc chng trnh hc bng ti VGU.

Ti hy vng nhng thng tin trn s gip bn tm kim c thng tin v cc chng trnh hc bng ti VGU.

title: can you give me some scholarship program at VGU ?

messages.content: can you give me some scholarship program at VGU ?

VGU offers several scholarship programs for its students. Here are some of the available scholarships:

[1] **IT Department Excellence Scholarship**: This scholarship is for VGU students in the Game Development department, with a GPA of 3.1 or higher, no disciplinary violations, and active participation in school activities. The value of the scholarship is 21,000,000 VND, and the application deadline is **February 11, 2026**.

[2] **Cybersecurity Scholarship - Round 13**: This scholarship is for VGU students in the Information Systems department, with a GPA of 2.7 or higher, no disciplinary violations, and active participation in school activities. The value of the scholarship is 15,000,000 VND, and the application deadline is **March 3, 2026**.

[3] **IT Scholarship for Students in Need - Round 3**: This scholarship is for VGU students in general, with a GPA of 3.5 or higher, no disciplinary violations, and active participation in school activities. The value of the scholarship is 15,000,000 VND, and the application deadline is **March 5, 2026**.

[4] **Web Development Scholarship - Round 9**: This scholarship is for VGU students in the Information Systems department, with a GPA of 2.9 or higher, no disciplinary violations, and active participation in school activities. The value of the scholarship is 5,000,000 VND, and the application deadline is **April 14, 2026**.

[5] **Information Security Scholarship - Round 6**: This scholarship is for VGU students in general, with a GPA of 3.3 or higher, no disciplinary violations, and active participation in school activities. The value of the scholarship is 15,000,000 VND, and the application deadline is **March 4, 2026**.

[6] **Software Development Scholarship - Round 5**: This scholarship is for VGU students in the Information Systems department, with a GPA of 3.8 or higher, no disciplinary violations, and active participation in school activities. The value of the scholarship is 13,000,000 VND, and the application deadline is **January 15, 2026** (note: this deadline has already passed).

[7] **Blockchain Technology Scholarship - Round 14**: This scholarship is for VGU students in general, with a GPA of 2.8 or higher, no disciplinary violations, and active participation in school activities. The value of the scholarship is 12,000,000 VND, and the application deadline is **January 25, 2026** (note: this deadline has already passed).

[8] **Cloud Computing Scholarship - Round 12**: This scholarship is for VGU students in the Software Engineering department, with a GPA of 3.7 or higher, no disciplinary violations, and active participation in school activities. The value of the scholarship is 16,000,000 VND, and the application deadline is **February 9, 2026**.

[9] **Game Development Scholarship - Round 8**: This scholarship is for VGU students in the Artificial Intelligence department, with a GPA of 3.9 or higher, no disciplinary violations, and active participation in school activities. The value of the scholarship is 5,000,000 VND, and the application deadline is **April 9, 2026**.

[10] **Programming Talent Scholarship - Round 7**: This scholarship is for VGU students in general, with a GPA of 3.6 or higher, no disciplinary violations, and active participation in school activities. The value of the scholarship is 14,000,000 VND, and the application deadline is **January 29, 2026** (note: this deadline has already passed).

Please note that some of these scholarships may have already expired, and it's essential to check the application deadlines to ensure you don't miss out on any opportunities. You can submit your application through the VGU online system, including an application form, transcript, and recommendation letter.

I hope this information helps you find a suitable scholarship program at VGU!
